programme.title: Boxing's New Era
programme.desc: CNBC's Arabile Gumede meets the young boxing promoter disrupting this lucrative sport, and goes ringside as unbeaten British fighters, Adam Azim and Caroline Dubois face international opponents.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (The Fyre Festival) S1 (n°172)
programme.desc: «The Fyre Festival»Disgraced Fyre Festival founder Billy McFarland uses fraud to launch his brand and a music festival in the Bahamas, selling thousands of tickets on the strength of a social media pitch.

programme.title: Brent Hoberman S1
programme.desc: Brent Hoberman is a true Tech Transformer having established two unicorn sized start-ups. In this exclusive interview he reveals his thoughts on Lastminute.com, Made.com and offers advice to the next generation of entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley (The Healing Power of Forgiveness) S3 (n°14)
programme.desc: «The Healing Power of Forgiveness»In his powerful message "The Healing Power of Forgiveness," Pastor Bayless Conley shows you how vital forgiveness is to experiencing healing in your life.

programme.title: Secret Lives of the Super Rich (Blockbuster Mansion & The Ultimate Power Wheels) S1 (n°603)
programme.desc: «Blockbuster Mansion & The Ultimate Power Wheels»Get a rare look inside legendary Hollywood film producer Jerry Weintraub's blockbuster vacation home. Go off-road in a redesigned 4x4 that costs as much as a Lambo. Be dazzled by the nearly five-million-dollar stunner worn by starlet Marilyn Monroe. Visit Disney World super-rich style; high atop your own castle in a $65k per night suite. Check out the most expensive house in Georgia, filled with rare antiques and fit for a southern belle. Go inside a super-exclusive VIP dinner club that gives new meaning to drive-in dining, with millions in classic cars. Tour a sleek Manhattan penthouse renting for $50k per month. Get a taste of the world's most expensive chocolate bar for a super-rich sugar high. And test drive one of the winningest Porsches on the planet that belonged to one of Hollywood's most beloved stars.

programme.title: N. R. Narayana Murthy S1
programme.desc: He's been described as the father of India's IT sector. N.R. Narayana Murthy, the Founder of one of the largest IT companies in the country, Infosys, sits down for The CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Open de Punta Cana
programme.desc: It's the second additional field event of the season, and Chad Ramey - after his solid week at THE PLAYERS Championship - returns to the Corales Puntacana Championship looking to become the first-ever back-to-back winner.

programme.title: April 2023
programme.desc: Mobil 1 The Grid is a Motorsport magazine show, supported by lubricant Mobil 1. The show first aired back in March 2009 and since then it has been the home of Motorsport videos. The show highlights latest Motorsports action from the world of Formula 1 including NASCAR, British Touring Car Championship, and IndyCar. It presents top well-known racing circuits, latest news, insights into teams and championships, and joins teams in their preparations. It takes an in-depth look at incredible racing machinery and star drivers from all over the globe, offering exclusive behind-the-scenes insight and analysis.

programme.title: Baja Hail Toyota Rally
programme.desc: The Baja Hail Toyota is the brand new event for Fia Bajas World Cup. It is located in Saudi Arabia, and used to be the main route taken by the pilgrims by camel. Nowadays the amazing desert landscape offers the perfect terrain for rallying. Experience top challenges of the rally and get ready to storm the desert.

programme.title: Cyclisme : Tour d'Oman
programme.desc: Don't miss a chance to see all the action and most memorable moments from the Tour of Oman, a professional cycling stage race that is a part of the UCI Asia Tour, held every year in the country of Oman.

programme.title: La fièvre du dollar (Les fausses créances de Me Dreier) (48/51)
programme.desc: «Les fausses créances de Me Dreier»Marc Dreier is a high-powered lawyer with celebrity clients. But Dreier is a conman and steals more than $700 million from hedge funds.

programme.title: NBC Nightly News
programme.desc: Join American journalist Lester Holt as he provides a comprehensive report on the latest national and international stories, featuring interviews with the relevant persons involved in the day's news. Lester and his guests offer adept analysis to help you make sense of the frantic stories emerging from the world of politics, economics and social issues. Nightly News also features a segment titled Making a Difference, where we celebrate ordinary Americans doing extraordinary deeds to benefit their surrounding local communities.
